item.title: Random Quote
item.description:
Motivational Quote

function generateQuote() { const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * quotes.length); const quote = quotes[randomIndex]; document.getElementById(‘quote’).innerText = "${quote.text}"; document.getElementById(‘author’).innerText = â€” ${quote.author}; }

// Generate a quote when the page loads window.onload = generateQuote;
